intro: Acmispon junceus, commonly known as slender needlepod, is a flowering plant native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. It is a member of the Fabaceae family, which includes legumes, and is characterized by its small, pea-like flowers. The plant typically grows in dry, rocky habitats and has small, narrow leaves that help reduce water loss. It produces slender, cylindrical pods that contain small, round seeds. Acmispon junceus is often found in disturbed soils and is adapted to arid environments.
